text: Approval for the visx star s4 ir excimer laser system with vss and wavescan wavefront system.  The device uses a 6.0 mm optical zone, a 9.0 mm treatment zone, and is indicated for wavefront-guided laser assisted in situ keratomileusis (lasik): 1) for the reduction or ee and the cylinder and sphere have opposite signs; 2) in patients 21 years of ath cylinder and sphere components) for at least one year prior to the date of pre-operative examination.
